content: Does anyone have a comparison of build times on a same machine between windows and linux?
(or a rough idea, or an guess/impression of one of those being faster?)
I haven't done that particular experiment. And I can't dual boot my Mac M1. It would be interesting to know.
If this is something you're interested in seeing, I can set up the build system to do a win/osx/linux build on master to see the results
if you want my educated guess based on all the other pipelines, windows will take 10-20% longer than OSX andLinux. OSX and Linux are a coinflip. They are around the same time ususally.
